key_quotes:
[POSITIVE] Content spending will remain elevated
                as we invest to improve our slate quality and competitive positioning.

[POSITIVE] While ad revenue grew, it hasn't offset the ARPU
                dilution yet.

[POSITIVE] Operating margin compressed to 19.3% from 22.4% last year due to increased
                content spending on underperforming titles and marketing costs to drive conversion.

[NEGATIVE] Revenue per member declined 3% as our lower-priced ad-supported tier cannibalized premium
                subscriptions more than anticipated.

[NEGATIVE] Engagement metrics showed concerning trends with watch time per
                subscriber declining 8%.

[NEGATIVE] We added 2.4 million paid memberships, significantly missing our
                forecast of 4.5 million due to softer than expected response to our password sharing
                initiatives and paid sharing rollout challenges in key markets.

reasoning: ✓ Low volatility (VIX: 18.5) indicates stable bull market

recommendation.rationale: Strong bullish signals across multiple indicators support risk-on positioning
suggested_actions: Focus on growth and cyclical sectors
Earnings beats likely to be rewarded by market
Look for momentum in high-beta names

overall_assessment.reasoning: Bullish macro offset by disappointing earnings
overall_assessment.sentiment_macro_alignment: DIVERGENT - Negative earnings contradict bullish macro (WARNING)
